dct_title_s: Map of the United States of North America with parts of the adjacent countries
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the United States of North America with parts of the adjacent countries
dct_description_sm: Map of the continental United States showing relief by hachures, drainage, state boundaries, cities and towns, roads, trails, canals, and railroads.
From his The American Atlas (London, J. Arrowsmith, 1839); Description derived from published bibliography.
